---
title: "Formulating data for meta-analyses"
---

This is the website for the second practical of the Training School -- Impact of
Meta-analyses on Clinical Practice.

## Part A

For the completion of **Part A** you will need to download the Cochrane systematic review from [here](https://www.cochranelibrary.com/cdsr/doi/10.1002/14651858.CD009865.pub2/epdf/full/en)

## Part B

For the completion of *Part B* you will need to download the data (csv file)
from [here](https://github.com/rekkasa-presentations/meta_analysis_practical_20240926/blob/develop/data/practical_20240926.csv)
